text: Anahate yisakale allahara lagata drrha angikarata arad'dha horaara pichata seya bhanga karae, yi samparka atuta raakhibalai allahe adesa karaiche seya chinna karae arau prthiraita asanti srsti karai phurae, sihamtara babe ache abhisapa lagate sihamtara babe ache akhiraatara nikrsta abasasthala
